Description: 
This application implements three commands to demonstrate the operations of the xdata.

To run the sample:
Please use Visual Studio 2017 to open the solution called "DotNetSamples.sln"ï¼Œthen build the application.

To use XData.dll:
1. Start ZWCAD and open a new drawing.
2. Run NETLOAD command and load the XData.dll file in the output directory.
3. Execute the "AddXData" command to add the xdata.
4. Execute the "ModXData" command to modify the xdata.
5. Execute the "DelXData" command to delete the xdata.
